text: @PressSec That is heartbreaking. What about the the families of the 132k that died of Covid19, the 11 y/o boys family, and the 17 y/o girl that’s mother thought it was a hoax and killed her child with  hydroxychloroquin because Dr. Trump said it was a cure. #votebluetosaveamerica
